name: Round7
description:
Made in less than 48 hours for GMTKJAM 2022.

WELCOME TO ROUND 7

- FOLLOW THE RULES IF YOU WANT TO SURVIVE

- REMEMBER THERE’S JUST ONE BULLET IN YOUR GUN. IF YOU FIRE IT, ANOTHER ONE WILL BE LOADED.

- BE THE LAST ONE STANDING!

CONTROLS:

WALK ----------------- WASD (Keyboard)

AIM -------------------- MOVE MOUSE

PULL TRIGGER ------ LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
